Next-generation investment company

InSoft Partners is a niche Investment Management Company in IT field.

We invest in the equity of companies and interested in the buying of a controlling stake in most cases. InSoft Partners is actively involved in the business development of its portfolio companies.

Vitaly Gorovoy
Founder at InSoft Partners
We help at all stages of value creation

From finance management and HR through production and delivery to lead generation

The creative economy of Ukraine is developing dynamically. The amount of investments and the number of startups in this industry are growing rapidly. According to experts, revenues in the Ukrainian IT-sector will amount to about $5 billion in 2019. We and our partners are convinced that ITernal Group will take a worthy place in the market and will contribute to the development of the innovative economy of Ukraine
Vasyl Khmelnytsky
Founder of UFuture
Quotes about our projects:
In the summer of 2019, UFuture and InSoft Partners entered into a strategic partnership agreement in IT-industry and established a joint company.
Why Choose Us
InSoft Partners is actively involved in the business development of its portfolio companies. We help at all stages of value creation (from finance management and HR through production and delivery to lead generation).
Internation Experience
We tackled projects from the United States to Ukraine, having internal experts in M&A, Biz Dev, Accounting and Operations.
Custom-tailored approach
We appreciate each portfolio company and consider all demands throughout our cooperation both for internal and external partners.
Internation Experience
We tackled projects from the United States to Ukraine, having internal experts in M&A, Biz Dev, Accounting and Operations.
Organizational Development
We create a long-term value for our portfolio companies from customers, markets, and relationships to implementing growth opportunities within and between organizations.
